snippet: Electricity customers are being asked to avoid using nonessential appliances like washers, dryers, dishwashers and extra lights because of problems with cables in the area.
abstract: Con Edison asks electricity customers in Harlem to avoid using nonessential appliances like washers, dryers, dishwashers and extra lights because of problems with electric cables in area related to winter weather and corrosion from road salt.
lead_paragraph: Electricity customers are being asked to avoid using nonessential appliances like washers, dryers, dishwashers and extra lights because of problems with cables in the area.

headline.main: Con Ed Asks Harlem to Conserve Power
headline.print_headline: Con Ed Asks Harlem to Conserve Power
